title: Podcasting and the Politics of Persuasion (with Pod Save America)
description:
How does a group of former White House staffers make politics accessible for a new generation? Preet talks with Pod Save America’s Jon Favreau, Jon Lovett, and Tommy Vietor about their very popular show and how to persuade young voters in a deeply partisan age.
Do you have a question for Preet? Tweet them to @PreetBharara or call 669-247-7338 and leave a voicemail.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
